pages.text: $(li)The Notice Board allows you insert it different items to show text, draws, or maps.$(br)$(li)You can interact with it using Hoppers.
$(li)You can insert a Book and Quill with writted text in its first page to show it.
$(li)You can insert a Map into the Notice Board. This one will show it like an Item Frame.
$(li)You can insert a Pattern into the Notice Board. This one will show the design of the Pattern inserted.
